Header.title: Expert Arborist Reports in the GTA

About.paragraph: Our skilled team demystifies your city's tree bylaws and helps gets your project moving sooner. With our comprehensive Arborist Reports and Tree Protection Plans, you stay compliant and protect the trees too!

Testimonials.text: DeFaveri Group Contracting Inc. contracted Gray Matter Forestry to assist in preparing an arborist report for a municipally owned project which had a few sensitive trees to address. Clayton was extremely helpful and expedited all work as this was time sensitive. The report was extremely detailed and provided us with the exact information required to move forward with construction. I would highly recommend Gray Matter Forestry for any arborist needs
Testimonials.name: Derek Meigs, Senior Project Manager - Defaveri Group

Team.name: Clayton Gray
Team.job:
International Society of Arboriculture Certified Arborist (ON-2611A) 
 ISA Tree Risk Assessment Qualification (TRAQ)

Features.title: Expert Arborist Reports
Features.text: Imagine you're on the verge of starting your next big project, only to encounter delays due to incomplete or inadequate tree protection documentation. Such setbacks can be costly and frustrating.

Features.title: Avoid Costly Delays
Features.text: Our expert team, fusing their in-depth industry knowledge with the latest tech, supplies top-tier Arborist Reports and Tree Protection Plans that comply with regulations.

Features.title: Save Time and Money
Features.text: Our approach not only saves you time and money but also ensures the preservation of urban trees, contributing to a greener and healthier environment..
